description: Located in Manila, 2.3 km from Shangri-La Plaza, MAXX Hotel Ortigas has accommodations with a restaurant, free private parking, a bar and a shared lounge. This 3-star hotel offers a concierge service. The property provides a 24-hour front desk and room service for guests. At the hotel, rooms have a desk. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a bidet and slippers, all rooms at MAXX Hotel Ortigas have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms also feature a seating area. At the accommodation the rooms include bed linen and towels. SM Megamall is 2.6 km from MAXX Hotel Ortigas, while Bonifacio High Street is 4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Ninoy Aquino International, 14 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

description: Well set in the Makati district of Manila, My Inn Edsa Guadalupe is located a 18-minute walk from Power Plant Mall, 2.3 km from Shangri-La Plaza and 2.6 km from SM Megamall. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and room service. Greenbelt Mall is 4.8 km from the hotel and Smart Araneta Coliseum is 6.8 km away. At the hotel, rooms have a desk. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a bidet and slippers, all guest rooms at My Inn Edsa Guadalupe have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms here will provide you with a seating area. At the accommodation every room has bed linen and towels. An Asian breakfast is available daily at My Inn Edsa Guadalupe. Bonifacio High Street is 3.4 km from the hotel, while Glorietta Mall is 4 km away. The nearest airport is Ninoy Aquino International Airport, 10.9 km from My Inn Edsa Guadalupe.
